scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && cross-env PYTHONDONTWRITEBYTECODE=1 PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --log-level debug
scripts.dev:all: concurrently --kill-others --names "API,INSIGHTS,PRO" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta,green" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:insights" "npm run dev:pro"
scripts.kill:node: powershell "Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force" 2>nul || echo No Node processes
scripts.kill:python: powershell "Get-Process python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force" 2>nul || echo No Python processes
scripts.kill:all: npm run kill:node && npm run kill:python
scripts.check:ports: echo === Port Status === && netstat -ano | findstr ":8000 :5173 :5174" || echo No servers running
scripts.check:processes: echo === Node === && tasklist | findstr node.exe && echo === Python === && tasklist | findstr python.exe || echo No dev processes
scripts.status: npm run check:ports && npm run check:processes
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd packages/insights && npm install && cd ../web && npm install
scripts.build:both: npm run build:insights && npm run build:pro
